message: Let's be fair, I'll take the lion's share this time, but you'll get a good chunk. We can work out a better deal later.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I value my time. Let's be realistic. This is a much fairer split considering the decreasing value over time.
Let's cut our losses. This is a fair compromise considering the shrinking value of the money.  Accept this and we can both walk away with something.
